name: The Dark and Flat - eBay
description: Give the Dark and Flat material design to eBay
additional_info: For more Dark and Flat styles click here Update 06/07/2018 - Fixed buttons in search results Update 10/05/2018 - Fix for search page Update 11/04/2018 - Added all categories page (thanks killerjn) Update 15/01/2018 - Added fixes for canadian version (thanks Bojangle), Also fixed search filters popups ("see all" buttons) Update 08/01/2018 - Cleaned the sytle code a bit and restyled few more elements (thanks noobert) Update 25/11/2017 - Fix leave feedback page Update 04/11/2017 - Fixed pagination and other minor stuff Update 28/10/2017 - Added backgound to check-out options Update 06/10/2017 - Fix for a few more cards and for advanced search Update 05/10/2017 - Changes for european version by me and simoconfa, fix for seller page Update 01/10/2017 - Support for most of ebay locallization Update 27/09/2017 - Fix "You're Following" items cards on the home page, add fixes for ebay.it (thanks simoconfa) Update 04/09/2017 - Add fixes for ebay.it (thanks simoconfa) Update 01/09/2017 - Added ebay.co.uk, fix buttons in some places Update 29/08/2017 - Fix for checkout page and for the italitan version of the site (thank simoconfa), change to all buttons on the website Update 09/08/2017 - Change for item info popups (in collections) and seller pages Update 09/08/2017 - Fixes to account settings and my eBay Update 07/08/2017 - Site wide changes, most notably the sign-in/sign-up box Update 05/08/2017 - Site wide changes, mostly in site header, search page and my eBay

discussions.name: Filter category bar + dropdown too bright
Item boxes white on listings page page and in shopping cart.
